metadata.title: CVE-2014-3121 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: rxvt-unicode before 9.20 does not properly handle OSC escape sequences,which allows user-assisted remote attackers to manipulate arbitrary Xwindow properties and execute arbitrary commands.

criterions.comment: rxvt-unicode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
